about_the_game:
DJMAX RESPECT V - BLACK SQUARE PACK!

Meet the 'DJMAX Portable BLACK SQUARE Song' package now!
This DLC contains a total of 21 songs.
Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX Portable BLACK SQUARE in DJMAX RESPECT V.

DJMAX RESPECT V - BLACK SQUARE PACK Track List


1 Proposed, Flower, Wolf part.2
2 Beat U Down
3 Colours of Sorrow
4 Cypher Gate
5 Desperado

8 Get Down

10 Heart of Witch
11 In My Dream
12 Jealousy
13 Keys to the World
14 Lovely hands
15 Lover (BS Style)
16 PDM
17 Ready Now
18 Ruti'n
19 Secret World
20 Y (BS Style)
21 analys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GTX 460 or AMD HD 5850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
